</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if the [[Eden Editor]] is currently in mission preview mode, single player or multiplayer. (see also [[is3DEN]], [[is3DENMultiplayer]])

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] [[is3DENPreview]] [[then]] {[[systemChat]] "Welcome to Eden Editor Preview!"};</code>
